scripts.buildPages: git diff --quiet && git diff --cached --quiet && npm run build && git checkout --orphan gh-pages-temp && git rm -rf . && powershell -Command "Move-Item dist\* ." && powershell -Command "Remove-Item dist -Recurse -Force" && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy React app to gh-pages" && (git branch -D gh-pages 2>$null || $true) && git branch -m gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages && git checkout main || echo Working tree not clean
